cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 425 miles south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the central Gulf, expected to turn north then north-northeast toward the southwest Louisiana coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Cameron, Louisiana (just east of the TX-LA border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: High Island, TX to Sabine Pass
weather_observation.warning_coast: San Luis Pass, TX to Sabine Pass
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Upper Texas coast through southwest and south-central Louisiana
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds likely Friday with peak gusts possibly near hurricane strength if the center trends west.
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–3 ft of surge possible in Sabine Lake and the Sabine-Neches waterway under the Surge Watch.
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–6 inches expected with isolated totals up to 10 inches, leading to flash and urban flooding.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes Friday and life-threatening surf/rip currents along the Upper Texas coast.
